mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_COMM VALUES (SEQ_BOARD_COMM.nextval, #{cboard_title}, #{cboard_content}, 0 , sysdate, #{user_no}, 0, 300, 20, NULL,NULL,sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT * from (SELECT rownum rn ,a.* from (SELECT bc.*, nvl(cnt,0) creply_cnt, u.user_name, u.user_nic FROM BOARD_COMM bc, (SELECT CBOARD_NO, count(*) cnt FROM BOARD_COMM_REPLY WHERE CREPLY_DELETE_CHK = 0 GROUP BY CBOARD_NO) bcr, users u WHERE bc.CBOARD_NO =bcr.CBOARD_NO(+) AND comm_big=300 AND comm_mid=20 AND bc.CBOARD_DELETE_CHK = 0 AND bc.user_no = u.user_no order by cboard_date DESC) a) WHERE rn >= #{start} and rn <=#{end}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT bc.*, u.user_nic FROM BOARD_COMM bc, users u WHERE bc.USER_NO = u.USER_NO AND bc.COMM_MID = 20 AND bc.CBOARD_DELETE_CHK = 0 AND (CBOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR CBOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR user_nic LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') ) a ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT bc.*, u.USER_NIC FROM BOARD_COMM bc INNER JOIN USERS u ON bc.USER_NO = u.USER_NO WHERE bc.CBOARD_NO = #{cboard_no}
SELECT bcr.* , u.* FROM BOARD_COMM_REPLY bcr , USERS u WHERE bcr.USER_NO = u.USER_NO AND bcr.CREPLY_DELETE_CHK = 0 AND cboard_no = #{cboard_no}
mapper.update: update board_comm set CBOARD_VIEWCNT = CBOARD_VIEWCNT+1 where cboard_no=#{cboard_no}
